description: This file defines the interface for the Cellular Manager Message Bus component, including function declarations for initialization, finalization, bus checking, and resource management. It also includes licensing information and macro definitions.

methods.name: CellularMgr_MessageBus_Init
methods.description: Initializes the message bus with specified component ID, config file, and path.

methods.name: CellularMgr_Mbi_Initialize
methods.description: Performs the initialization of the message bus interface with user data.

methods.name: CellularMgr_Mbi_Finalize
methods.description: Finalizes and cleans up resources for the message bus interface.

methods.name: CellularMgr_Mbi_BusCheck
methods.description: Checks the status of the message bus.

methods.name: CellularMgr_Mbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees resources associated with the message bus, based on priority.
